books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Five decades in the lives of two families — parents, children, siblings, stepchildren — remade by divorce.
books.name: COMMONWEALTH

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Robin Burcell
books.description: Sam and Remi Fargo pursue an ancient treasure.
books.name: PIRATE

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Craig Johnson
books.description: Sheriff Walt Longmire and his friend Henry Standing Bear investigate a motorcycle accident. The basis of the Netflix series.
books.name: AN OBVIOUS FACT

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas of the N.Y.P.D. calls on the technological expertise of her husband when three skaters are shot by a sniper.
books.name: APPRENTICE IN DEATH

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Lauren Blakely
books.description: The witty and wealthy Wyatt marries his off-limits assistant after a drunken spree in Las Vegas.
books.name: WELL HUNG

books.author: by Carl Hiaasen
books.description: The ex-cop Andrew Yancy​ from ​“Bad Monkey” gets involved in a kidnapping gone wrong.
books.name: RAZOR GIRL

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: A teenage girl heads north on the network that helped slaves escape to freedom, envisioned in this novel as a secret system of actual tracks and tunnels.
books.name: THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Reed Farrel Coleman
books.description: Jesse Stone pursues a psychotic assassin out for revenge; a continuation of the series by Parker, who died in 2010.
books.name: ROBERT B. PARKER'S DEBT TO PAY

books.author: by Ian McEwan
books.description: A fetus in utero overhears his mother plotting with his uncle to kill his father.
books.name: NUTSHELL

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.
books.name: THE LAST MILE

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: A police academy instructor is murdered, perhaps by a cadet favored by the retired homicide chief Armand Gamache.
books.name: A GREAT RECKONING
